existing_features.title: Create a single-page Valentine proposal UI that asks Palak to be the user's Valentine, with two prominent buttons labeled "Yes" and "No".
Implement the "No" button interaction: each time "No" is clicked, the "No" button progressively shrinks until it becomes extremely small, making it difficult to click compared to "Yes".
Implement the "Yes" button interaction: when "Yes" is clicked, replace the prompt/buttons (or clearly transition the UI) to show a large celebratory message: "YAYYYY I LOVEEEEEEE YOUUUUUUUU".
Apply a coherent, playful Valentine-themed visual design (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) consistently across the page without using a blue/purple primary palette.
Add the required generated images into the app as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the Valentine page layout.
